sense.name: work together on a common enterprise
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[actor] COLLABORATE NP2[actor] Includes: COLLABORATE ON
sense.examples: She collaborated with the Welsh illustrator Llewellyn on her last children's book. Students often collaborated on projects outside the classroom. They collaborated on their first song in 1978.

sense.name: cooperate as a traitor
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[actor] COLLABORATE NP2[actor] Includes: COLLABORATE WITH
sense.examples: He refused to say whether he had collaborated with the communist-era secret services. Vichy actively collaborated with the Nazis.
